I-I understand!\""},{"lineNumber":16795,"originalJapaneseLine":"　〆切りを忘れてる訳じゃないので……","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not like I've forgotten the deadline...\""},{"lineNumber":16796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはようございました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's good to hear.\""},{"lineNumber":16797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実はこっちも、火縄銃の改良計画が……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Actually, on our side as well, there is a plan to improve the matchlock guns...\""},{"lineNumber":16798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あああそうだったーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahhh, that's right---!\""},{"lineNumber":16799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちから言い出したのにごめんーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry for bringing it up myself---!\""},{"lineNumber":16800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……重彦おじさんが全裸で待機してるので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... It's definitely not an atmosphere where I can bring up the topic...\""},{"lineNumber":16804,"originalJapaneseLine":"　話を持ち込める空気じゃないわね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's not an atmosphere to bring up the subject...\""},{"lineNumber":16805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ゼスもか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Zeth as well.\""},{"lineNumber":16806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……闘神技術、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Toujin technology,"},{"lineNumber":16807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し触った経験があるらしいじゃない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've heard you have some experience handling it a bit, haven't you?\""},{"lineNumber":16808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マナバッテリーのメンテナンス、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want you to check if maintenance on the mana batteries,"},{"lineNumber":16809,"originalJapaneseLine":"　僅かでも可能かどうか、見て欲しいんだけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"even just a little, is possible...\""},{"lineNumber":16810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、面白そう…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that sounds interesting...\""},{"lineNumber":16811,"originalJapaneseLine":"仕事待ちの面々が、少し尖った視線でマリアを見た。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those waiting on work looked sharply at Maria."},{"lineNumber":16812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……嘘です。冗談です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm lying. I'm joking."},{"lineNumber":16813,"originalJapaneseLine":"　溜まった仕事、すぐにやりますぅ……","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll get to the piled-up work right away...\""},{"lineNumber":16814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「新開発、したいよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to do new development...\""},{"lineNumber":16815,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふらふらと、マリアは連行されるようにして","translatedEnglishLine":"Dazed, Maria was led away like she was being taken along."},{"lineNumber":16816,"originalJapaneseLine":"歩き去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"She walked off."},{"lineNumber":16817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………難儀な奴」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What a troublesome person.\""},{"lineNumber":16818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ。タコヤキ焼きの屋台出てる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah. There's a takoyaki stand open."},{"lineNumber":16819,"originalJapaneseLine":"　食べる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Want some?\""},{"lineNumber":16820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう。二皿な」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. Two plates.\""},{"lineNumber":16821,"originalJapaneseLine":"仕事の合間を縫って、","translatedEnglishLine":"Between work,"},{"lineNumber":16822,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアはランスとデートに来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria had come on a date with Rance."},{"lineNumber":16823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here you go, Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":16824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。…………って、お前も二皿か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah. ...Hey, you are having two plates too.\""},{"lineNumber":16825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヤンキーソース味っていうのが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's the 'Yankee Sauce' flavor that caught my attention..."},{"lineNumber":16826,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気になっちゃって……あはは」","translatedEnglishLine":"I couldn't help but try it... haha.\""},{"lineNumber":16827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「太るぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You'll get fat.\""},{"lineNumber":16828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「平気ですー。べーだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm fine with it. Nyah!\""},{"lineNumber":16829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん。まったく……あちち、焼きたてか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. Really... Ouch, it's freshly baked.\""},{"lineNumber":16830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん、あ、おいしい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, ah, this is delicious...\""},{"lineNumber":16831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、一口よこせ。とーー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, give me a bite. Here we go—\""},{"lineNumber":16832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ちょ、いきなり楊枝突っ込まないでって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey, don't suddenly stab it with a toothpick like that."},{"lineNumber":16833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　危ないなあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's dangerous.\""},{"lineNumber":16834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、はぐもぐ…………甘っ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, *munch munch*... Sweet!?\""},{"lineNumber":16835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーなの。甘いタコヤキ焼き。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it's sweet takoyaki."},{"lineNumber":16836,"originalJapaneseLine":"　めずらしー」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's unusual.\""},{"lineNumber":16837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう、むぐ、しかしこの甘さは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, *munch*, but this sweetness is...\""},{"lineNumber":16838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいしいでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's tasty, right?"},{"lineNumber":16839,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カスタムでもやらないかなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if they'll make a custom flavor like this too—\""},{"lineNumber":16840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「太るぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You'll get fat.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使える人増やすには教えなきゃなんないし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To increase the number of capable people, we have to teach them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マリア殿には、リーザスに設置した兵器に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Maria also has tasks related to the weapons installed in Liesz..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 関連した仕事もお願いしていますので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...so we are asking her to handle related work as well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、マリスさん！　わ、分かってますー！
〆切りを忘れてる訳じゃないので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like I've forgotten the deadline..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはようございました」
「実はこっちも、火縄銃の改良計画が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Actually, on our side as well, there is a plan to improve the matchlock guns..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああそうだったーーーー！
こっちから言い出したのにごめんーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sorry for bringing it up myself---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……重彦おじさんが全裸で待機してるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... Uncle Shigehiko is waiting here completely naked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風邪を引かないうちに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so before he catches a cold..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どついて服着せとけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Knock some sense into him and get him dressed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ……んん……とてもじゃないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... mm... It's definitely not an atmosphere where I can bring up the topic..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話を持ち込める空気じゃないわね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not an atmosphere to bring up the subject..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ゼスもか」
「……闘神技術、
少し触った経験があるらしいじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard you have some experience handling it a bit, haven't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マナバッテリーのメンテナンス、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want you to check if maintenance on the mana batteries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かでも可能かどうか、見て欲しいんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even just a little, is possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、面白そう…………」
仕事待ちの面々が、少し尖った視線でマリアを見た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those waiting on work looked sharply at Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……嘘です。冗談です。
溜まった仕事、すぐにやりますぅ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll get to the piled-up work right away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「新開発、したいよぉ……」
ふらふらと、マリアは連行されるようにして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dazed, Maria was led away like she was being taken along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歩き去っていった。
「…………難儀な奴」
「あ。タコヤキ焼きの屋台出てる。
食べる？」
「おう。二皿な」
仕事の合間を縫って、
マリアはランスとデートに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria had come on a date with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいランス」
「ああ。…………って、お前も二皿か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah. ...Hey, you are having two plates too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヤンキーソース味っていうのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the 'Yankee Sauce' flavor that caught my attention...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気になっちゃって……あはは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't help but try it... haha."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「太るぞ」
「平気ですー。べーだ」
「ふん。まったく……あちち、焼きたてか」
「んん、あ、おいしい……」
「ほう、一口よこせ。とーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, give me a bite. Here we go—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ちょ、いきなり楊枝突っ込まないでって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, hey, don't suddenly stab it with a toothpick like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危ないなあ」
「がははは、はぐもぐ…………甘っ！？」
「そーなの。甘いタコヤキ焼き。
めずらしー」
「むう、むぐ、しかしこの甘さは……
「おいしいでしょ？
カスタムでもやらないかなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if they'll make a custom flavor like this too—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「太るぞ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
